product_name: Brooks Silver Bullet II Jacket - Women's
long_description: The windproof and water-resistant women's Brooks Silver Bullet II jacket uses an aluminum membrane to reflect body heat so you can be warm without adding extra layers in nasty, wet weather. Aluminum membrane creates more warmth with minimal weight. Stretchy fabric under arms and on back enhance movement. Storm flap on right chest hides and protects a moisture-proof media pocket that works with your tunes. Snap draft flap conceals a full front zipper. Hand pockets can be accessed from the open sides or from top-snaps. Cozy cuffs with thumbholes and flip mitts keep hands warm. The semifitted women's Brooks Silver Bullet II jacket is not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: The windproof and water-resistant women's Brooks Silver Bullet II jacket uses an aluminum membrane to reflect body heat so you can be warm without adding extra layers in nasty, wet weather.
